tool.name: attribute_eo

param.name: in_ProcFeats
param.dialogReference:
Input polygon feature class with "site-worthy" Procedural Features (PFs).

For this tool to work, this feature class must have the following fields:

  • SF_EOID

  • ELCODE

  • SNAME

  • RULE

NOTE: This should have been generated by the "Extract Biotics data" tool.

param.name: in_elExclude
param.dialogReference:
Input table containing list of elements to be excluded from the process.

NOTE: This list should be updated at least once annually. The "Create Element Exclusion List" tool is used to compile the CSV files from different biologists into a single geodatabase table named "ElementExclusions".

param.name: in_consLands
param.dialogReference:
Input polygon feature class representing conservation lands (managed areas).

For this tool to work, this table must have the following fields:

  • MATYPE

  • BMI

NOTE: This dataset should be requested from the Natural Heritage Conservation Lands GIS Planner.

param.name: in_consLands_flat
param.dialogReference: A "flattened" version of the input conservation lands feature class, based on level of Biodiversity Management Intent (BMI). (This is needed due to overlapping polygons in the database).

param.name: in_ecoReg
param.dialogReference: Input polygon feature class representing ecoregions. Must contain a text field 'GEN_REG' containing ecoregion names.

param.name: out_gdb
param.dialogReference: Output Geodatabase. Output files with standard names will be written here.

param.name: suf
param.dialogReference:
Text to add to the base output file name(s).

Generally, you should not alter this from the default value, which auto-populates based the primary input to this tool.

param.name: typesList
param.displayname: Attribute EOs associated with the following site type(s):
param.dialogReference: Site type(s) selection. Only PFs associated with the selected site type(s) will be included in the EOs for the prioritization.

tool.summary:
Attaches various attributes to the site-worthy portions of Element Occurrences (EOs), creating a new output feature class as well as a summary table.

The outputs from this tool are required as inputs to the "Score Element Occurrences" and "Build Conservation Portfolio" tools.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Attaches various attributes to the site-worthy portions of Element Occurrences (EOs), creating a new output feature class as well as a summary table.

The outputs from this tool are required as inputs to the "Score Element Occurrences" and "Build Conservation Portfolio" tools.
